description:
Frenzic is a unique puzzle game that
dazzles the eye, teases the brain and
keeps you coming back for more! It
takes only minutes to learn, but
months to master as you devise new,
impressive play strategies to push
your brain to its limit. Compete
against your personal best and climb
through six levels of Devotion from
Newbie all the way to Frenzic Master.
Frenzic is a must have for puzzle
enthusiasts of all ages!
name: Frenzic
